list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: turn over with a sudden quick movement.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Máy bay lật đổ và sau đó bùng nổ

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she flipped off her dark glasses
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy lật kính bóng tối của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: suddenly lose control or become very angry.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: buy and sell (something, especially real estate or shares) quickly to make a profit.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she dismissed his qualms with a flip of her hand
